CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Infinite Canvas in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Infinite canvas in Visio for the web is an expansive digital canvas designed to remove spatial limitations. It will allow users to stretch their creative boundaries by providing the room they need to capture, organize, and visualize ideas without constraints.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Infinite Canvas in Visio for the web
OldVersion.description: Infinite canvas in Visio for the web is an expansive digital canvas designed to remove spatial limitations. It will allow users to stretch their creative boundaries by providing the room they need to capture, organize, and visualize ideas without constraints.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Event Recap in Town hall and webinar (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for town hall and webinar event instances, just like the intelligent recap experience you are used to in meetings. Event organizer, co-organizers and presenters can now easily explore the meeting recording by speakers and topics, and access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. In addition to availability with a Teams Premium license, intelligent event recap features are also available in Copilot for Microsoft 365 licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt with a coworker
CurrentVersion.description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Lab, inspiring your co-workers to acheive more with Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt with a coworker
OldVersion.description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Lab, inspiring your co-workers to acheive more with Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
OldVersion.description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
CurrentVersion.description: When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
OldVersion.description: When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Collaborative authoring
CurrentVersion.description: Multiple authors can collaborate on a Viva Amplify publication at the same time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Collaborative authoring
OldVersion.description: Multiple authors can collaborate on a Viva Amplify publication at the same time.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Auto-run Data Access Governance (DAG) reports
CurrentVersion.description: You can now schedule to run your DAG reports automatically every 28 days and also receive notification when the auto-run completes.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Auto-run Data Access Governance (DAG) reports
OldVersion.description: You can now schedule to run your DAG reports automatically every 28 days and also receive notification when the auto-run completes.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Advanced Management - Restricted content discoverability
CurrentVersion.description: This is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities which allows SharePoint admins to restrict content discoverability in organization-wide search and Copilot experiences.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Advanced Management - Restricted content discoverability
OldVersion.description: This is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities which allows SharePoint admins to restrict content discoverability in organization-wide search and Copilot experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for common area phones
CurrentVersion.description: This roadmap item is cancelled and replaced by 81379. We are sorry for any inconvenience. IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for common area phones
OldVersion.description: IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enterprise Application Insights for SharePoint sites
CurrentVersion.description:
Enterprise Application Insights is a powerful report which helps SharePoint Administrators to discover all the SharePoint sites that are allowed access by third-party applications registered in your tenant. The report also provides details on the application's permission and requests count to help admins take further action to strengthen the security of the site.

It is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Enterprise Application Insights for SharePoint sites
OldVersion.description:
Enterprise Application Insights is a powerful report which helps SharePoint Administrators to discover all the SharePoint sites that are allowed access by third-party applications registered in your tenant. The report also provides details on the application's permission and requests count to help admins take further action to strengthen the security of the site.

It is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bulk operations summary in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can monitor and track the status of all bulk operations on Teams Devices through the Teams admin center, enabling large-scale management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bulk operations summary in the Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: IT admins can monitor and track the status of all bulk operations on Teams Devices through the Teams admin center, enabling large-scale management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: With a Teams Shared Device license assigned to a desk pool, admins can view valuable analytics for these spaces including number of peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy under 'Reports' in the portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
OldVersion.description: With a Teams Shared Device license assigned to a desk pool, admins can view valuable analytics for these spaces including number of peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy under 'Reports' in the portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set workplace presence to the building level in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you connect to peripherals in a bring your own device (BYOD) room or at a bookable desk, your workplace presence in Teams will automatically be set to the building level (if you and your admin have given permission), simplifying coordination with others and enabling AI-assisted booking in the future.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set workplace presence to the building level in Teams
OldVersion.description: When you connect to peripherals in a bring your own device (BYOD) room or at a bookable desk, your workplace presence in Teams will automatically be set to the building level (if you and your admin have given permission), simplifying coordination with others and enabling AI-assisted booking in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio support for screen sharing in immersive events
CurrentVersion.description: We're adding audio support for screen sharing in Microsoft Mesh. Presenters will now be able to choose whether they'd like to include system audio when starting a screen share in a Mesh event. This feature is available for presenters in Mesh with a Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio support for screen sharing in immersive events
OldVersion.description: We're adding audio support for screen sharing in Microsoft Mesh. Presenters will now be able to choose whether they'd like to include system audio when starting a screen share in a Mesh event. This feature is available for presenters in Mesh with a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share Recap Notes to Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers and presenters have the capability to share recap notes and follow-up tasks directly from Teams to Outlook, facilitating the seamless sending of post meeting follow-up emails.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Share prompts with others in Business Chat and Copilot Lab
CurrentVersion.description: Easily share a prompt with others in the form of a link.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Share prompts with others in Business Chat and Copilot Lab
OldVersion.description: Easily share a prompt with others in the form of a link.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Import and Search function support for Sensitive service domains group
CurrentVersion.description: Purview Endpoint DLP improves the management of Sensitive service domains group by allowing you to import a URL group and search a specific URL across all groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom Meeting Branding - Support multiple meeting themes per customization policy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now create and assign multiple meeting themes to a customization policy in the Teams Admin Center. This will allow meeting organizers who are assigned to a customization policy the ability to select from different meeting theme options while scheduling their meetings. Note - this feature requires a Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom Meeting Branding - Support multiple meeting themes per customization policy
OldVersion.description: Admins can now create and assign multiple meeting themes to a customization policy in the Teams Admin Center. This will allow meeting organizers who are assigned to a customization policy the ability to select from different meeting theme options while scheduling their meetings. Note - this feature requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications
CurrentVersion.description: You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of toast notification
OldVersion.description: You can now customize where your notification toasts appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto-association of BYOD room devices in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: Manually associating peripherals to rooms may feel like an endless task if your organization has several bring your own device (BYOD) rooms. IT admins can streamline the process and get enhanced inventory visibility with this feature which utilizes meeting room invite data to intelligently associate peripherals to these spaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
CurrentVersion.description: We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted multiple times, creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
CurrentVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot chat-assisted scheduling
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot now helps you schedule simple meetings such as 1:1s and focus time. Just ask Copilot to find some time with someone in your org and it will find the optimal time. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications pane batching
CurrentVersion.description: Batches are groups of cards in the user's Notification pane separated by subject. Items from the same email thread, document, sheet, etc. will be grouped into a single batch. #newouotlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google to Entra Identity Sync service
CurrentVersion.description: Google to Entra Identity Sync service is a cloud-2-cloud user Identity onboarding and one way synchronization tool from Google workspace to Entra ID. This will be available as part of the M365 Admin center for Google compete customers moving into M365 to create the identities in M365 farm and move Drive and Mail content into Onedrive and Exchange online

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service
CurrentVersion.description: Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service is a 1st party service for migrating Google groups with the M365 Admin center as a new feature, so that Google compete customers moving to M365 would have the ability to automatically create the groups, its members, member conversations and all permissions to M365 Groups without the need to recreate the groups which is the only solution for customers moving from Google.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Unified Google Workspace Migration
CurrentVersion.description: Offer Microsoft 365 customers a seamless experience for migrating Google Workspace workloads to M365. Through a unified portal page, you can initiate and monitor migration tasks for both Gmail and Google Drive. Additionally, if your Google Workspace tenant has fewer than 1,000 users, you'll benefit from the newly revamped Gmail migration flow, which simplifies the process and guides you through each step.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for Teams Phone devices in Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Contact sync to Android-based Teams devices from Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Infinite Canvas in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Infinite canvas in Visio for the web is an expansive digital canvas designed to remove spatial limitations. It will allow users to stretch their creative boundaries by providing the room they need to capture, organize, and visualize ideas without constraints.
